member.name: T:LinFu.AOP.Tasks.PostWeaveTask
member.summary: Represents an MSBuild task for LinFu.AOP that allows users to inject an aspect framework into their applications at postbuild time.

member.name: P:LinFu.AOP.Tasks.PostWeaveTask.TargetFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating the full path and filename of the target assembly.

member.name: P:LinFu.AOP.Tasks.PostWeaveTask.OutputFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating the full path and filename of the output assembly.
member.remarks: This field is optional; if blank, the default value will be the same value as the property.

member.name: P:LinFu.AOP.Tasks.PostWeaveTask.InterceptAllMethodCalls
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether or not third party method calls should be intercepted in the target assembly.
member.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not third party method call interception should be enabled.

member.name: P:LinFu.AOP.Tasks.PostWeaveTask.InterceptAllMethodBodies
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether or not method bodies should be intercepted in the target assembly.
member.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not method body interception should be enabled.

member.name: P:LinFu.AOP.Tasks.PostWeaveTask.InterceptAllNewInstances
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether or not new instances should be intercepted in the target assembly.
member.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not new instance interception should be enabled.

member.name: P:LinFu.AOP.Tasks.PostWeaveTask.InterceptAllFields
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether or not field reads and writes should be intercepted in the target assembly.
member.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not field reads and writes should be enabled.

member.name: P:LinFu.AOP.Tasks.PostWeaveTask.InterceptAllExceptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating whether or not thrown exceptions should be intercepted in the target assembly.
member.value: A boolean value indicating whether or not exception interception should be enabled.

member.name: M:LinFu.AOP.Tasks.PostWeaveTask.Execute
member.returns: Returns true if the operation succeeded. Otherwise, it will return false.
